name: Cleverboxes - 273E3LSB/00 | Philips E-Line 27 inch LED Monitor 1200:1 300 cd/m2 1920 x 1080 3.5ms VGA DVI-D
certifications: BSMI • CE Mark • FCC Class B • GOST • SEMKO • PSB • SASO • TUV Ergo • TUV/GS • UL/cUL • TCO certified • WEEE
description: You want the LCD flat display with the highest contrast and most vibrant images. Philips advanced video processing combined with unique extreme dimming and backlight-boosting technology results in vibrant images. SmartContrast will increase the contrast with excellent black level and accurate rendition of dark shades and colours. It gives a bright, lifelike picture with high contrast and vibrant colours. Touch controls are intelligent, touch sensitive icons that replace protruding buttons that lets the user adjust the monitor to their requirement. Responding to your lightest touch, Touch control gives the monitor a modern feel. SmartControl Lite is the next generation 3D icon-based GUI monitor control software. This allows the user to fine-tune most parameters of the monitor like Colour, Brightness, screen calibration, Multimedia, ID management etc with the mouse.
plug_and_play: DDC/CI • Mac OS X • sRGB • Windows 7
